ygData.subject: Re: Skill cap?
ygData.msgSnippet: Two of your characters have had skill increase over 200?  Recently?  My buddy has had a skill of 209 for over a month and in several hundred attempts on
ygData.messageBody:
Two of your characters have had skill increase over 200? Recently? My
buddy has had a skill of 209 for over a month and in several hundred
attempts on non-trivial items it has not moved. Another of our
jewelers has had skill 219 for some time, and i'm not sure how
recently his has moved. I'm at 193 skill now and fear that I may have
prematurely hit the pinacle of jeweling.

Q



--- Ric R <redr@...> wrote:
> From: Ric R <redr@...>
>
> Yes, I've seen Jewelcraft go over 200 on two
> players.
>
>
>
> At 10:12 AM 7/28/99 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> >
> >One of the uber-jewelers on my server thinks that
> the skill level may
> >have been retroactively capped at 200. Has anyone
> seen a skill
> >increase over 200 in recent weeks? At a max of 200
> no platinum would
> >ever be trivial.
